content.introduction: YaCoVi stands for "Yannicks Computer Vision" and is a small app to experiment with cloud-based Computer Vision API's (Azure Cognitive Services or Google Cloud Vision).
content.description:
Who is Yannick?
Yannick is one of our working students and the reason why we started this project. He is also the main person responsible for the small project.
